options.content:
## Disclaimer 

This Experimental Dashboard is not a part of the official Percona Monitoring and Management (PMM) deployment and might be updated. 
We ship this Dashboard to obtain feedback from our users. 

Once we officially release this Dashboard, it will be moved to the appropriate folder. 

## About Dashboard

This Dashboard is a part of the [DBaaS solution](https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-monitoring-and-management/2.x/using/dbaas.html) in PMM.
This Dashboard displays the resource consumption in the K8s Cluster.

To provide feedback on the Dashboard, visit [our forum](https://forums.percona.com/c/percona-monitoring-and-management-pmm/pmm-unofficial-dashboards-and-plugins/67).

panels.title: WARNING! Experimental Dashboard. Expand to read more.
